title: How to score 100 in physical education - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: If you are told that physical education does not need a keen study, then it is false. For you need to study well and understand things which will make you score well. All you need to do is follow the Together With book which has the best explanations with its lucid language. Also, you will find help for there are 10-year question papers solved rationally. If you follow the common question that has been consecutively repeated, along with a thorough understanding of the chapters, you will rock it!

check my answer out by following this link https://www.quora.com/How-do-I-get-maximum-marks-in-physical-education-in-the-CBSE-12th-boards/answer/Neha-Chaudhary-63?ch=99&share=1ac9b34b&srid=VL7X4 Hope this helps you
